Evrard Gatana holds a Bachelor’s Degree in Information Management from the Adventist University of Central Africa (AUCA). He has worked with various institutions such as Evangelical Friends Church as a Consultant for Ideas Box in partnership with GIZ. Currently, he is working at Hope Assistance Foundation as an IT Consultant and a Teacher in communication skills. Evrard is also an author of children’s books and he is also working on authoring books for adults.
